Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package moby-containerd-cc for versions less than 1.7.7-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package moby-containerd-cc for versions less than 1.7.7-5. A patched version of the package is available.
